items.sentence: Tom didn't seem to know that I used to live in Boston.
The room was so dark that we could see nothing at all.
It'll take about thirty minutes to get to the airport.
It would've been reasonable for Tom to have done that.
Tom's parents are happy that he's back from Australia.
Do you think that you can find someone to replace Tom?
If you're hot, maybe you should take off your sweater.
Don't wolf down your food. You should eat more slowly.
Tom and I have decided to go to Australia next summer.
We hope that things will be back to normal by October.
I hope that you're aware that no one is above the law.
They hope that this time things will work out for you.
I hope that Tom can actually do what he says he'll do.
Tom spends a lot of money buying things he never uses.
That sounds like a fun way to spend a couple of hours.
Tom made a mistake, but I know that he won't admit it.
I didn't realize Tom didn't live in Australia anymore.
How long do you think that Tom will stay in Australia?
Everyone knew that Tom didn't want to visit Australia.
Everyone knew that Tom didn't like going to Australia.
